'''''As Though Beholding Illusions''''' is the second part of the [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival]] Event.

==Steps==
# Wait till the next morning (07:00 &ndash; 09:00)
# Go to the venue
# Go to the area outside the venue
# Go to [[Sayu]] and Investigate
# Go to [[Thoma]] and Investigate
# Go to [[Mizuki]] and Investigate
# Talk to [[Ei]]
# Wait until nighttime (21:00 &ndash; 24:00)
# Invite Ei to the [[Aisa Bathhouse]]
# Talk to Ei in the Aisa Bathhouse
# Go to the area outside the Aisa Bathhouse
# Return to the venue on [[Mt. Yougou]]
# Follow the [[bake-danuki]]
# Traverse the obstacles
# Break the bake-danuki's disguise
# Find the suspicious bake-danuki statue (0/3)
# Talk to [[Kinkaku]] and the others
# Pay another visit to [[Ioroi]]
# Talk to [[Miko]] and the others
# Talk to Ei

==Gameplay Notes==
* During steps 13 to 17, the player will be in a [[Special Story Mode]]. Several menus, including [[Party]] setup and the [[map]], cannot be accessed. Most gadgets cannot be used. Leaving the Special Story Mode will reset the quest to step 13, and the player can re-enter by interacting with the indicated entity<!-- is it a rift? it doesn't look like something that could be called a rift... --> in Chinju Forest.
<gallery>
As Though Beholding Illusions Begin Pursuit.png|Entity with the interaction prompt "Begin Pursuit"
</gallery>
* The [[Dusty Balloon]] "section" of the path can be completely bypassed by following the river instead of the path.
* Kinkaku, Ginkaku, and Tetsunosuke's torch disguises have leaves on them and are located together near the end of the torch "section" of the path. Their statue disguises also have leaves on them.

:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 tetsunosuke 03.ogg}} '''Tetsunosuke:''' Hmph... When the human, [[Kamuna Harunosuke]], came to hurt us...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ginkaku 03.ogg}} '''Ginkaku:''' We ran and hid... The human searched and searched... So many friends couldn't move. Our youkai powers were getting weaker...

:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 tetsunosuke 04.ogg}} '''Tetsunosuke:''' That's when we uncovered a horn filled with youkai power! It was the will of the great bake-danuki [[Giichiro]] made manifest!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 kinkaku 04.ogg}} '''Kinkaku:''' It restored our power! And we made the human go thump thump, clang clang, slash slash!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 07.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' Ooh! And by thump thump, clang clang, slash slash, you mean...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 kinkaku 05.ogg}} '''Kinkaku:''' ...We tricked him and ran!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 08.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' ...So, you didn't actually beat him up at all...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ginkaku 04.ogg}} '''Ginkaku:''' We've been using the horn to hide ever since... But, there are too many humans... It's getting harder to hide...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 02.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' A horn full of youkai power... Could that be the source of the nightmares? The reason the bake-danuki are so afraid of humans?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 03.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' If the horn contained the fragment of a nightmare, using its power to hide would spread the nightmare to them. That means, the bake-danuki have been trapped in this state of anxiety... for five hundred years...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 09.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' Hah, I could have told you nothing good would come from that horn... Using external power is against the Tanuki path!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 kinkaku 06.ogg}} '''Kinkaku:''' Eek! We... strayed from the path?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ginkaku 05.ogg}} '''Ginkaku:''' But... the horn helped us hide from the humans! The humans tried to take our land...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 03.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...On the contrary, the purpose of the investigation was to determine in advance if youkai were present on the land in question.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 04.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Whether we avoid encroaching on youkai territory altogether or attempt to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, a peaceful resolution was always the goal.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 tetsunosuke 05.ogg}} '''Tetsunosuke:''' Oh... really?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ginkaku 06.ogg}} '''Ginkaku:''' Wait... that IS what the human said back then, isn't it...
:;(A flashback begins, this time without the nightmare's influence)

:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 10.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' Kinkaku, Ginkaku, Tetsunosuke... Not all humans are bad. Yellow Fur over there helped me a great deal, you know...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Besides, the bake-danuki were only sealed away back then because Ioroi stole that comb...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 tetsunosuke 06.ogg}} '''Tetsunosuke:''' Ioroi... is a thief? Ioroi... got what he deserved?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 11.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' ...H&mdash;H&mdash;How was I to know it was used to make Sacred Sakura Daifuku? I gave it back, didn't I!?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 kinkaku 07.ogg}} '''Kinkaku:''' So, the humans were mean for no reason?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 12.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' Well... if you must know, the young human and I fought... I was, perhaps, a tad careless, so I... conceded the match! Anyway, the point is... Neither side is bad!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' There he goes again, changing the subject when it makes him look bad...

:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 tetsunosuke 07.ogg}} '''Tetsunosuke:''' So... it was all a nightmare...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ginkaku 07.ogg}} '''Ginkaku:''' Five hundred years in hiding... for nothing...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 13.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' ...Eh, it was a five-hundred-year-long game of Hide-and-Seek. What's so bad about that? Besides, you won.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 kinkaku 08.ogg}} '''Kinkaku:''' Huh? We won? ...Go us! We're even better than Ioroi!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 14.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' Hey! My game of Hide-and-Seek isn't over yet!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wow, the mind of a bake-danuki is something else... Still so cheerful, even after all that...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 04.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' That nature is what isolated them from the worst effects of the nightmare and prevented them from causing any real harm.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 05.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' But, a nightmare that's still affecting people after all this time? Who could it belong to? Hm, a horn buried under Mt. Yougou...
:{{DIcon}} I feel like I've heard a legend about that...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 03.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' ...Tainted by darkness, the oni warrior raised her sword against the Almighty Shogun. Losing an arm and a horn to the Shogun's blade, she fled into the forest, never to be seen again.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 04.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' ...A trusted lieutenant fighting against the forces of darkness, she was once devoured whole by a beast from beyond this world, with the body of a tiger and the tail of a serpent, until she tore the creature apart from within...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 05.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Thus, she earned the name, "Chiyo the Tiger-Bite"... Or, "Torachiyo."
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 05.ogg}} '''Ei:''' I don't think... [[Chiyo]] would like that name.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 06.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Though she escaped the belly of the beast alive... That battle never left her.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 07.ogg}} '''Ei:''' She saw the memories of her fallen comrades everywhere, slaughtered one after another, until she could no longer distinguish dream from reality...
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (A nightmare doesn't incapacitate someone with sufficient strength... It turns into something even worse...)
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 08.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...The nightmare twisted every joy in her life &mdash; her subordinates, family, and friends &mdash; into enemies in need of destruction.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 09.ogg}} '''Ei:''' It was in that state, trapped in the battlefield of her mind, that she raised her sword against me on Mt. Yougou.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 10.ogg}} '''Ei:''' With the Musou no Hitotachi, I cut off her arm, one of her horns, and a portion of the mountain itself... I suspect that is when the horn in question was buried there.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 06.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' And, subsequently, uncovered by three bake-danuki... That means the fragment on the horn... comes from Chiyo's nightmare.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 06.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' Nightmares feed on fear and anxiety. If what {{Traveler}} saw is true...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 07.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' It's possible Kinkaku and the others' fear over the past five hundred years allowed the fragment to gain physical form and become something akin to a jibakurei.
:{{DIcon}} Jibakurei?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 08.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' An earthbound spirit. They move through the [[Ley Line]]s, but are also bound by them. That's why the traces of this entity appeared intermittently, and never outside of Mt. Yougou.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 07.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' It would seem the fragment of this Nightmare is no different from the one back then... It hates all joy and every good thing in this world.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 08.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' The Investigation Team working for a better future? Attacked... Hitotsume Kozou and his friends, kind enough to lend a helping hand? Attacked...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah, and we were attacked, too! Right when we were having fun with the play-testing...
:{{DIcon}} So, why hasn't it appeared since?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 11.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Perhaps it needs to regain strength after your defeat... Or, perhaps it is biding its time because it knows, with whatever rationality remains, that it cannot defeat you...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 12.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...But, sooner or later, its twisted hatred will force it out of hiding, and it will move to strike its "enemies."
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 13.ogg}} '''Ei:''' When Chiyo set her sights on a target... She never was one to waver.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 09.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' ...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 14.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...But, both possibilities prove something... Nightmare Fragments can be defeated.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 15.ogg}} '''Ei:''' And an enemy that can be killed... is one that can be split in two by the power of Musou Isshin.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 09.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' ...There's really no other way?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 16.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Mikoshi Chiyo is gone. A fragment of a Nightmare tied to a severed horn... That is all that remains. The living must take precedent over the memory of the dead.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (Even so, having to unleash Musou Isshin against her again? Would Ei really be okay?)
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (Mizuki said Archons suffer from the same turmoil as the rest of us... The dead may be gone, but that doesn't mean our emotions die with them...)
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 10.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' ...Who cares about the dead, anyway?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 11.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' I'm just trying to look out for the living.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 17.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...! What is that supposed to mean, Miko?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 12.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Oh, I'm just concerned about our poor bake-danuki friends...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 tetsunosuke 08.ogg}} '''Tetsunosuke:''' Huh? What does this have to do with us?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 13.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' The Nightmare Fragment has been tied to the bake-danuki for nearly five hundred years. Strike it down, and who's to say whether you take the lives of our poor friends along with it.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ginkaku 08.ogg}} '''Ginkaku:''' EEEK!?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 15.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' I... I beseech you, Almighty Shogun! S&mdash;Spare the young ones! It was just a momentary... Or, uh, no... a five-hundred-year long lapse in judgement...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 18.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Miko... You speak the truth?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 14a.ogg}}<!--{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 14b.ogg}}--> '''Yae Miko:''' If you don't believe me, ask Mizuki and {{Traveler}}. I'm sure they've encountered similar cases during their extensive travels...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 10.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' Well, I... Oh!
;(Miko, Mizuki, and the Traveler look at each other)
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 11.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' ...Yes! During my studies, both in [[Liyue]] and [[Natlan]]!
:{{DIcon}} Yeah! I've definitely seen that happen before!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 19.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Then... What would you propose? This Nightmare Fragment is a constant threat to Inazuma. Should all other options fail... I will take action.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 12.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' ...If the Fragment's hatred toward the world comes from a Nightmare, then the most logical option... is to get rid of the Nightmare itself...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Right! Can't you just eat the Nightmare, Mizuki?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 20.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...The Yumekui-Baku already tried that five hundred years ago. Even yesterday, when faced with the corruption of the Nightmare, Mizuki could only mitigate the effects.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 15.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' What was impossible back then... is not necessarily impossible now. I think Mizuki has the right idea. If we cannot eradicate the nightmares directly...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 16.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Why not use this entity's tricks against it? Combat illusions with illusions. Combat nightmares... with dreams.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Is that even possible?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 17.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Don't forget &mdash; there are youkai that specialize in shapeshifting and illusions, and they happen to be right in front of us.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 kinkaku 09.ogg}} '''Kinkaku:''' Wh&mdash;Where? Kinkaku doesn't see them anywhere!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 tetsunosuke 09.ogg}} '''Tetsunosuke:''' Maybe they're hiding as trees? Or the wind?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 ioroi 16.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' Fools! The kitsune is clearly referring to the bake-danuki! Tetsunosuke, Kinkaku, must you be so dense!?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 18.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Given their centuries-long connection to the Nightmare Fragment, they are perfectly positioned to create a dreamscape that the entity will be unable to distinguish from the real world.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 21.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...Back then, the Nightmare had little to no weaknesses... If we want to give the bake-danuki an opportunity to strike, I assume you have a plan, Miko?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 19.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' You said it yourself &mdash; Mikoshi Chiyo is gone. All that remains is a fragment of her nightmare, already broken and vulnerable.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 20.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Besides... Mizuki is an old friend, one that is not to be underestimated. She has traveled the land studying dreams and is far more capable than those old fossils back then.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 13.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' Oh... Um...
:{{DIcon}} ...Not gonna say anything?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 14.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' She just... usually doesn't compliment me to my face... But, Miko's right. If we work together, I'm confident we can put together a ritual to subdue the Nightmare Fragment.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 21.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Once we perform the ritual, it will take some time for the barrier to take effect. Luckily for us, we have two formidable warriors on our side...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 22.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' ...Our festival representative, who also happens to have extensive experience against dark forces, and the Almighty Shogun, unmatched in combat... I'm sure the two of you can buy us some time?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 15.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' There's just one problem... Since this entity can pass through the Ley Lines, its movements are unpredictable. If we're going to create a barrier, how can we be sure it appears where we want?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 23.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Ah, the solution to that... is obvious. If the Nightmare Fragment despises all sources of joy and happiness...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 24.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Then, naturally, a joyous occasion would be an evil beyond measure &mdash; an enemy that must be annihilated at all costs...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 16.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' So, if we want to lure it out...
:{{DIcon}} We need a source of joy.
:{{DIcon}} Then, the obvious target would be...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' ...The Mikawa Flower Festival!
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 25.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Hehe, what joy could possibly compare to finishing one's work right before the deadline?
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 22.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...I would imagine we can all think of a few. But, I agree &mdash; the Mikawa Flower Festival is the most plausible target.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 23.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Once the enemy appears, I will pull them into the Plane of Euthymia immediately... I will not put the people in danger.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 raidenei 24.ogg}} '''Ei:''' {{Traveler}}, I ask that you join me there so we can subdue the enemy together.
:{{DIcon}} Of course.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 26.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Alright, I will update everyone back at the festival and start the preparations for the ritual... I'll need your help, Mizuki. It's going to be a busy night.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 17.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' Looks like another all-nighter for me.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 yaemiko 27.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' ...Well, this was your idea. Oh, and don't forget &mdash; you need to finish "[[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival/A Little Fox's Daydream|A Little Fox's Daydream]]" as well.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 11 mizuki 18.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' ...And, in a surprising twist, you were my nightmare all along!

;(Talk to Ioroi or Yae Miko, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 yaemiko 01.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Well, Ioroi, as I see it, you've been punished long enough. It's about time you were released...
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 ioroi 01.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' R&mdash;R&mdash;Released!? I can do that myself any time I want! This statue keeps me warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Don't interfere!
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 together 01.ogg}} '''Kinkaku, Ginkaku, and Tetsunosuke:''' Ioroi is the best!
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 ioroi 02.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' ...Besides, the seal's power is almost gone... What I really want is for you to help me give [[Kitsune Saiguu|that sneaky kitsune]] a piece of my mind!
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 yaemiko 02.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' ...Ioroi, she's already&mdash;
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 ioroi 03.ogg}} '''Ioroi:''' Not so fast! I won't be fooled by your tricks again! Whatever you were about to say, she can tell me herself, instead of sending some young kitsune to hoodwink me!

;(Talk to Yumemizuki Mizuki, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 tetsunosuke 01.ogg}} '''Tetsunosuke:''' Great youkai really wasn't forced to work all night?
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 mizuki 01.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' That's right. It was my choice.
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 kinkaku 01.ogg}} '''Kinkaku:''' Why does great youkai have to work?
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 mizuki 02.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' ...I suppose it's just the price of becoming a great youkai.
:{{A|vo dialog schjeq002 ginkaku 01.ogg}} '''Ginkaku:''' Great youkai, Ginkaku is sad for you...

;(Talk to Ei)
:{{A|vo schjeq002 12 raidenei 01.ogg}} '''Ei:''' {{Traveler}}... During the battle tomorrow, it is imperative you know your limits. If the enemy proves too much to handle... leave them to me.
:{{DIcon}} But&mdash;
:{{A|vo schjeq002 12 raidenei 02.ogg}} '''Ei:''' I know... I understand your concerns, just as you know mine. We need not say any more than that. Just get some rest and prepare yourself for the battle to come.
:{{DIcon}} Okay.
:{{DIcon}} Get some rest, Ei.
:{{A|vo schjeq002 12 raidenei 03.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...
:{{A|vo schjeq002 12 raidenei 04.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Ah, one more thing... Thank you.
{{Dialogue End}}
